message: Thought this could be a good area to bring Christian topics to other Christians.

Now I know that challenging people on what they think/know is True is hard sometimes and things can get ugly quickly. I'd urge everyone that takes part in discussions on this group to be fair and thoughtful.
Just in-case it needs to be said, you guys can create topics as well :) http://i.imgur.com/yWBgp.jpg
Anyone have any other topic ideas? Maybe something we should study together? Things the church faces today?

Is the internet a good place to have deep constructive conversations about these things? The more I try the more I am convinced it's not. People either do not read what is written or do not explain properly. Mood and emotion cannot be transmitted. Maybe I am just in a bad mood? Who knows?
Paul is calling all the non participants old.
Seems our generation sucks at this sort of thing :/
saying that here doesn't help captain absent!
Hey guys, sorry for being so scarce here. It's been crazy busy at work. Thought I'd pop in and see what's happening.
My project's done so I'm back. I see a total of one post... wow. I suppose two guys makes it boring? Let's see if we can add some fuel to these chats (the good kind).
No point if it's only two....Linton and I debate things together on Skype all the time....kinda pointless to then also use convore if it's just gonna be the two of us...

@pevans_om I am not sure how to encourage others to join us. I have tried. Nicole has even written a few lines here and there and then never had the "guts" to push the enter key and let her thoughts be put out in the public domain.
@penkin she doesn't want to be wrong as often as you!
@LintonCaldecott something like that :) I just walk around with no clue what I'm doing and letting everyone else know :D
@kujoeb hey guy. We just chat anything and everything here. Come up with new topics and what what. Cool to have another opinion in this small small group.
also, tell your wife that she often provides insightful comments that resolve many divisive points. which makes it wrong cause i permit not a woman to speak...
